doc:
Leo Burmester https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leo_Burmester 0 Leo Burmester (February 1, 1944 – June 28, 2007) was an American actor. Burmester worked for director John Sayles several times, including in Passion Fish (1992) and Lone Star (1996), and also for directors such as John Schlesinger and Sidney Lumet, and as the Apostle Nathaniel in Martin Scorsese's The Last Temptation of Christ (1988). He also starred in the CBS sitcom Flo as Randy Stumphill, the mechanic who frequented the bar. Leo_Burmester ( February_1_,_1944 – June_28_,_2007 ) was an_American_actor . Burmester worked for director_John_Sayles_several_times , including in Passion_Fish_(_1992 ) and Lone_Star_(_1996_) , and also for directors such_as John_Schlesinger and Sidney_Lumet , and as the_Apostle_Nathaniel in Martin_Scorsese 's_The_Last_Temptation of Christ_(_1988_) . He also starred in the_CBS_sitcom_Flo as Randy_Stumphill , the_mechanic who frequented the_bar .
